headline: Ask HN: What are some fun projects to run on a home K8s cluster?
description:
What are some cool projects to self host on a home Raspberry Pi (64 bit) Kubernetes cluster (Helm charts). arm64 support is a must. A lot of projects only build amd64 Docker containers which don't run on my cluster.

I currently run:

   - obenebs (provides abstraction for using local k8s worker disks as PVCs when running on-prem) -- https://openebs.io/
   - metalLB (provides load balancer abstraction when running k8s on-prem) -- https://metallb.universe.tf/
   - traefik (load balancer) -- https://traefik.io/
   - minio (object storage s3 compliant) -- https://min.io/
Any other cool utilities or projects to play around with?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 在家用K8s集群上有哪些有趣的项目可以运行？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 在家用K8s集群上有哪些有趣的項目可以運行？
description_zh-Hans:
有哪些很酷的项目可以在家用Raspberry Pi（64位）Kubernetes集群（Helm图表）上自行托管。arm64支持是必须的。很多项目只构建amd64的Docker容器，这些容器不能在我的集群上运行。

我目前运行的是：

 - obenebs（在内部运行时为使用本地k8s工作者磁盘作为PVC提供抽象）-- https://openebs.io/
   - metalLB (当运行k8s on-prem时提供负载平衡器的抽象) -- https://metallb.universe.tf/
   - traefik (负载平衡器) -- https://traefik.io/
   - minio (兼容对象存储S3) -- https://min.io/
还有什么其他很酷的工具或项目可以玩一玩？
